'''''Minecraft: Mega Bite-Sized Builds''''' is a building tutorial book containing 20 small-scale builds.

== Synopsis ==
{{Quote|Embark on another bite-size adventure! Build over 20 new mini projects in Minecraft, from duck party boats and houses on the moon to steam trains and fire engines! There's even a UFO that abducts cows! <br><br> With illustrated step-by-step instructions and tips throughout, this book will have you creating loads of fun builds to impress your friends!}}
